### Chart A

```{r}
credit_data %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = loan_amnt, fill = loan_intent, colour = loan_intent))+
  geom_density(alpha = 0.4)+
  scale_x_continuous(labels = scales::dollar_format(scale = 10^-3, prefix = "$", suffix = "K", big.mark = ".", decimal.mark = ","))+
  labs(x = "Loan Amount", y = "Density", subtitle = "Density Plot for Loan Amount per Loan Intent", fill = "Loan Intent", colour = "Loan Intent")+
  theme_minimal()+
  theme(
    axis.text.y = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks.y = element_blank(),
    panel.grid.major.y = element_blank(),
    panel.grid.minor.y = element_blank(),
    legend.position = "bottom",
    legend.direction = "horizontal"
  )
```
